channel.title: Development Environment on Project Dovetail™ - Docs and Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Development Environment on Project Dovetail™ - Docs and Tutorials

item.title: Setup your Dev environment
item.description: Install Go and create workspace and setup GOPATH environment viarable as instructed Install Docker and Docker Compose Install Hyperledger Fabric Install Hyperledger Composer Install Visio Studio Code and Hyperledger Composer plugin Install Maven make sure you have access to following jars com.tibco.dovetail:dovetail-corda:0.0.1 is available here <dependency> <groupId>org.jetbrains.kotlin</groupId> <artifactId>kotlin-stdlib-jre8</artifactId> <version>1.1.60</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>net.corda</groupId> <artifactId>corda-core</artifactId> <version>[2.0.0,)</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>net.corda</groupId> <artifactId>corda-finance</artifactId> <version>[2.0.0,)</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.tibco.dovetail</groupId> <artifactId>dovetail-corda</artifactId> <version>0.0.1</version> </dependency> Install flogo-lib Install flogo-contrib Install go-bindata Intall govendor Download [Project Dovetail™ Studio]() after starting up the studio, you can upload contrib-smartcontract.
